import axios from'axios';// const API_BASE_URL = process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL || 'http://127.0.0.1:8000';
const API_BASE_URL=process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL||'http://192.168.0.100:3001';const adminApi=axios.create({baseURL:"".concat(API_BASE_URL,"/api/admin"),headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'}});export const login=credentials=>{const formData=new FormData();formData.append('username',credentials.username);formData.append('password',credentials.password);return adminApi.post('/login',formData,{headers:{'Content-Type':'multipart/form-data'}});};export default adminApi;
